title: Sabrent Ultra-Portable Weatherproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker For Outdoor/Indoor 10 hours Rechargeable Battery (SP-BYTA)
description: Sabrent mini outdoor portable Bluetooth speakers can be connected to listen to music with Bluetooth wireless technology or 3.5mm headphone connector. High capacity battery facilitates up to 10 hours continuous playback on a single fully charge and amplifier brings exceptional sound.Compatible with all audio player and multimedia devices with a Universal 3.5mm Audio Jack.The portable Bluetooth wireless mini speaker can be put into a purse, computer bag, arm, or backpack for easy listening while traveling.Enjoy and share your music, movie, games, presentation, anytime and everywhere. Connect to your iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, MP3/MP4, Mobile Phone, Game Console, Netbook, Desktop, Laptop, Android and any other portable device for an amazing experience outdoors or indoors!Features:* Advanced audio performance delivers a full-range listening experience* Wirelessly connects to your Bluetooth device* Rechargeable battery plays up to 10 hours* Auxilary port lets you connect other audio sources, like an MP3 playerWhat's in the box?* Portable Bluetooth Wireless Mini Speaker* Universal charging Mico-USB Cable * User Manual* 2” Carabineer Snap HookWarranty:This product comes with a 1 year manafacture warranty. In order for us to properly assist you, please follow these simple instructions:Go to www.sabrent.com/support and click 'Submit a ticket'.Submit your ticket.You must include your Amazon Order ID# number in the subject line.
